EmailTemplate.name: Activating MBO Account - One Final Step , A Confirmation, and Estimate (13797159
EmailTemplate.subject: Activating MBO Account - One Final Step , A Confirmation, and Estimate (1379715930.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Don, I wanted to catch up with you on the last few items for your account. I went ahead and created an updated estimate for you (attached) for this project just to refresh your memory on how MBO works and for your records. It assumes $157.50 per hour, 40 hrs. a week, fully maximized 401(k), and $500 a month in operating expenses. If you have any questions about this, would like to see another version, and/or review this via phone please let me know. Please confirm that you will NOT need MBO to hold a clearance for this work (as this would add an additional percentage to the MBO fee). The last step is logging into MBO Access <https://access.mbopartners.com/> and completing the “Industry Expertise” and “Disciplines” sections of your profile. This information needed for our workmen’s comp. policy and must be completed before I can activate your account and get you billing. Your user ID and password is the same as your MBO Business Center. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
